## BitField.toggleAt() method

Inverts bit `n`<!-- -->. Returns a non-zero value if the bit was previously enabled. No bounds checking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toggleAt(n: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | bit number |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
